bug.author: vsaase
bug.description:
tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/distributions/python/ops/mvn_full_covariance.py
Line 48 in b46340f
pdf(x; loc, covariance_matrix) = exp(-0.5 ||y||**2) / Z,
this should be only y, not ||y||^2

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/vsaase>@vsaase</denchmark-link> Can you fill a <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/ISSUE_TEMPLATE.md>template</denchmark-link> with good explanation of the pointed mistake along with the wiki links or substantial proof? I can create PR for this one!
